Articles.Content:
With the latest version (.25) and no mods, I have been having multiple crashes in different situations with Space planes ... this particular one was after a Revert, upon loading back into the SPH, the game crashes or freezes up.

I have uploaded the crash report, which is located here (ZIP file with contents):

http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=98661161933611493300

Edited October 12, 2014 by Caelib
